message: I'm offering you a product for $1000000. I'm willing to give you a 50% chance to inspect it before you buy. If you buy, you'll get the product, and if you don't, I'll reveal its quality, and we can discuss further.
I'd like to inspect the product first, as this information will help me make a more informed decision.

However, I'm willing to give you a unique opportunity to buy it now at a 10% discount, which would bring the price down to $900000. This is a one-time offer, and if you decline, the price will remain at $1000000.
Although the 10% discount is appreciated, I still don't have any information about the quality of this product. I'd like to know its quality before making a decision.

I understand your concerns. Let me offer you a'reverse auction' deal. I'll give you the opportunity to make an offer on the product, and if you're willing to pay at least $950000, I'll sell it to you. If you make an offer below $950000, I'll reveal the product's quality, and we can discuss further.
